Bookmarks

Coach Credits

  • Set Coach Credits to 99999
  • Set Coach Credits to 50000
  • Set Coach Credits to 30000

How to Use Bookmarklets

  • To use a bookmarklet
  • Drag one of the links above to your bookmarks bar.
  • While playing Retro Bowl, click the bookmark to update your coach credits.
  • Refresh the game to see the changes.
